I used many unrar programs but 'WINRAR' seems to work the best. If your already using WINRAR then your SOL

@dtstuff9: If you don't want to bother finding/learning merge software (it's no big deal tho), just get ConvertX, go to the prefs, and tell it to play the titles consecutively. Still two files, but only a second (maybe 2) of lag time/black screen. Saves a step if you're just making a personal use copy.

@kaisar302: winRAR + ConvertX to burn. If the RARs are complete and uncompromised (as i imagine these are), you'll be fine. If not, it's as eagle_poacher said...SOL...
